overview: Based on the computer role-playing game (RPG) of the same name, Anachronox: The Movie is a feature-length "machinima" motion picture. In the 2002 Annual Machinima Awards, Anachronox was awarded first place for best picture, first place for best writing, first place for best technical achievement, first place for best visual design, and first place for best editing.
title: Anachronox: The Movie
